segments.text: I am calling to ask the position of HR manager . Could you tell me more about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We are looking for someone who are well-educated and have all-round experience as a manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a master's degree in HR management in Peking University . And I worked as a HR manager in a European enterprise for many years . I know it is not just some clerical issues , but more social work with reason and patience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . What about having a formal interview on Monday next week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , thanks a lot . See you then .
segments.speaker: S1
